Name: Boutari Agiorgitiko Nemea
Description: Clear ruby red colour; floral,  berry herbs, spice and red plum aromas; extra dry, medium body; ripe berry and plum flavours, balanced acidity and ripe tannins.

Name: THALIA Red  Cabernet Sauvignon - Agiorgitiko
Description: The Greek island of Crete, where this winery is located, traces back to a 4000-year-old history of winemaking. This red blend is made with Agiorgitiko, a grape variety indigenous to the island. The result is a medium-bodied wine with notes of red berries, ripe cherries, and earthy spice. Pair with hearty roasts.

Name: Paco & Lola Albari√±o
Description: This is a lively, zesty wine. Created by a co-operative of 428 growers that was formed in 2005, it displays fresh fig, cantelope, pineapple, with nutty and citrus notes. A good option as a sipper or for pairing with summer salads or seafood.

Name: Masi Costasera Amarone Classico DOC
Description: Deep purple ruby colour; rich, ripe, dark fruit aromas and flavours with hints of licorice, toast and chocolate; full-bodied and smooth with a firm, long finish.

Name: Cesari Amarone Della Valpolicella Classico DOC
Description: Deep ruby colour; nuts, chocolate, licorice, raisins and spice aromas; dry, medium to full bodied; rich flavours of hazelnut chocolate, raisins and spice; long finish.

Name: Montresor Amarone Della Valpolicella DOC
Description: Dark ruby-red colour; licorice, red fruit, dried figs and raisins and spicy aromas and flavours; dry, medium bodied, with balanced acidity, ripe tannins and good length.

Name: Trius Baco Noir VQA
Description: Situated on Niagara-on-the-Lake, Trius has been creating quality wines for decades. This wine is deep ruby, with lovely notes of plum, earthy beets, cherry, spice and a hint of new leather. It's full-bodied and smooth with a lengthy finish. Serve with saucy ribs or grated beets and goat cheese over Fettuccini Alfredo.

Name: Bersano Costalunga Barbera D'Asti DOCG
Description: Bright garnet hue; spice, smoke and plum notes are evident on the nose; light earthy, smoky, plummy fruit flavours with light leather notes and good acidity.

Name: Georges Duboeuf Beaujolais AOC
Description: Dark ruby colour; young berry fruit & cherry aromas; soft fruit flavour; easy drinking style.

Name: Pasqua Passimento Rosso IGT
Description: Deep ruby red colour; intense aromas of smoke, licorice, coffee and hints of vanilla and spices. Flavours of smoke, diried fruit and spices, with soft tannins to finish.

Name: Peller Family Vineyards Cabernet Merlot
Description: Cabernet franc, cabernet sauvignon and merlot are classic blending partners, creating well-balanced wines that have the freshness and structure for food pairing. Extra dry and medium bodied, offering aromas and flavours of black plum, chocolate, cedar, smoky oak and cassis. Serve with flank steak and grilled vegetables.

Name: Three Dog Winery Dog House Red VQA
Description: Deep red with balanced acidity and intense fruit flavours of spice, sweet plum, herbs and hints of fresh rye bread. Serve with anything you throw on the grill, from eggplant to steak, or even chicken wings and pizza.

Name: Black Tower Rivaner
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, fragrant pear and peach aromas with citrus and spicy notes; medium sweet with floral fruit and balanced acidity.

Name: Colio Dry White
Description: Pale straw colour; delicate yeasty note with fig, pear and melon fruit on the nose; dry with soft acidity on the palate with a clean finish.

Name: Red House Wine Co. Baco Cabernet Sauvignon VQA
Description: Medium deep ruby red colour; pungent aromas of prune, spice, vanilla and herbs with earthy, leafy, toasty notes; dry, medium bodied, with a sweet fruit center, moderate acidity, soft medium tannins and flavours of juicy, sweet plum fruit; hints of spice and vanilla on the finish.

Name: XOXO Pinot Grigio Chardonnay
Description: XOXO wines are smooth, easy to enjoy and ideal for any occasion. Pinot Grigio and Chardonnay grapes make a perfect match, with delightful flavours of fragrant fresh pear, nuts, cantaloupe and vanilla. This fresh, stylish white is great on its own, or pairs wonderfully with seafood, salads and sushi.

Name: Sandbanks Shoreline Chardonnay Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Sandbanks have been one of the leading wineries in Prince Edward County since 2003. A blend of unoaked chardonnay and pinot grigio that offers floral, pear, fig, melon and mango notes. Medium-bodied and extra dry with a finish that is delicate yet flavourful. Serve with seafood salad, Cajun cuisine or use in a Sangria.

Name: Peller Family Vineyards Dry White
Description: Pale yellow straw; grapefruit, yellow melon and floral aromas; extra dry with soft round fruit flavours and light tropical fruit notes; easy drinking wine.

Name: EastDell Black Cab VQA
Description: Deep ruby red colour; lifted aromas of spice, dark fruit and smoke with green/leafy notes; extra dry, medium-plus bodied, soft and rounded, flavours of dark fruit and berries with herbal and earthy notes.

Name: De Chanceny Cremant De Loire Rose Brut
Description: Pale salmon colour with fine bubbles; lifted aromas of red fruit, plum, toast and raspberry/strawberry mix; extra dry, medium bodied, with zesty flavours of red plum, red berries and a hint of toast.

Name: Vineland Estates Cabernet Franc VQA
Description: Deep ruby/purple colour; aromas of black fruit, spices, chocolate, dried herbs and plum; extra dry, medium-bodied, well structured with flavours of black berry and fruit, spice and dark chocolate; long, lively finish.

Name: Pelee Island Lola Cabernet Franc Cabernet Sauvignon VQA
Description: In Ontario's southwestern edge, Pelee Island Winery enjoys plenty of sunshine during growing season. Expect vibrant aromas and flavours of cedar, dark berries and fruits, with mint, spicy and herbal notes. Medium-bodied and fruity with a dry finish, this is a great match for a charcuterie board with deli meats and cheeses.

Name: Paul Mas Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Paul Mas vineyards are in the Languedoc region in the south of France. Garnet red with ruby hints, this Cabernet Sauvignon has intense aromas of red fruit, cocoa, tobacco, mint and spicy vanilla. Full-bodied with ripe fruit mid-palate and notes of cocoa and smoky spice on the finish. Pair with grilled meats and charcuterie.

Name: Bask Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Low in sugar and high in flavour! Bask created this low-sugar wine to give you one less thing to worry about. Inviting aromas of blackcurrant, black cherry, toast and spice. Dry and full-bodied with subtle warming spices round out the finish. A perfect match for smoky grilled duck breast with peach BBQ sauce.

Name: Yellow Tail Cabernet Sauvignon Whiskey Barrel Aged
Description: This-full-flavoured red spent time in Australian whiskey barrels, creating a wine with enhanced complexity. Expect aromas of plum, cherry, oak spice, and vanilla. The palate reveals subtle notes of malt and honey, with fine tannins on the long finish. Pair with rack of lamb or baked figs on crusty bread topped with Brie.

Name: Jacob's Creek Double Barrel Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A legend in South Eastern Australia, Jacob's Creek Double Barrel Cabernet Sauvignon offers a unique flavour profile from the oak barrel ageing and finishing in the used whisky barrels. Expect cassis, mint, caramel, oak and olive notes. It's full-bodied and smooth with silky tannins on the long finish. Try with rack of lamb.

Name: Francis Coppola Diamond Collection Ivory Label Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Classically styled Cali Cab featuring cedar, prune, licorice, herbs and oak toast. It's dry and fruity, with supporting tannins and supple acidity. A crowd-pleasing wine. Try it with grilled stuffed peppers or alongside gourmet burgers with caramelized onions.

Name: Bread & Butter Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: California has a world-class reputation for great cabernet sauvignon, and this rich example shows why. It brims with aromas of toast, nuts, dark fruit and chocolate that lead to flavours of ripe dark fruit and chocolate-covered plums and ends in a smooth finish with a hint of spice. Enjoy with grilled steak or on its own.

Name: Beringer Founders' Estate Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Made with fruit grown in Lodi and the California Delta, where the climate is ideal for ripening cabernet sauvignon. Extra dry and medium-bodied with supple texture and forward dark fruit, spice and chocolate flavours. The finish is long, with notes of vanilla, smoky oak and herbs. Pair with lamb sausages on spiced couscous.

Name: Wente Southern Hills Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium ruby purple colour; extra dry and medium to full-bodied with upfront ripe berry fruit and hints of vanilla; medium tannins; long finish.

Name: Barramundi Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The Barramundi winery captures the fun-loving, friendly and adventurous spirit of Australia. Pouring deep ruby, this wine invites with notes of raspberry jam, mint and a hint of green olive. The palate is complex with spicy and floral flavours, vanilla and silky soft tannins. Pair this with a Roasted lamb shank.

Name: Angove Organic Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Brilliant ruby in colour with a pronounced nose of oak toast, cedar, prune, chocolate and light herbal character. The palate is medium-bodied, extra dry, with soft to medium acidity and noticeable tannins; expect concentrated toast and prune character, chocolate, and a medium length herbaceous finish.

Name: 19 Crimes Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Inky purple with upfront aromas of cassis, licorice, herbs and vanilla; the palate is medium to full and dry with balanced acidity and soft tannins. Look for big fruity flavours of cassis and vanilla followed by a lengthy, spicy finish.

Name: Misterio Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby red colour with an intense nose of plum, coffee, rye bread, cedar and wild honey; extra dry, medium bodied; ripe fruit flavour with silky tannins in a long finish.

Name: Santa Carolina Reserva de Familia Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Founder Luis Pereyra Cotapos longed to produce Bordeaux-style wines in Chile. Since 1875, this dream has been a driving force behind Santa Carolina's success. This Cab has rich notes of cedar, chocolate and cassis with black plum and nutty accents.

Name: Jackson-Triggs Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Light to medium ruby garnet colour; dry and medium bodied with lively crisp cassis berry character and very light tannins.

Name: Big Bill Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Named for the larger than life first manager of KWV, Bill Millar. The color a rich and opaque ruby; on the nose look for aromas of prune, cedar, chocolate and spice. The palate is medium-plus bodied and extra dry with supportive tannins and acid balancing big dark fruit character followed by a lightly spiced, medium finish.

Name: Argento Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Medium violet/ruby colour; coffee, toast, nuts, black plum and cedar on the nose; dry, medium-full-bodied with a ripe fruit center, supple tannins and good length on the finish.

Name: St. Sup√©ry Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
Description: Aromas of blackcurrants, blackberries, roasted walnuts, vanilla and licorice with some earthy character. Fresh and juicy on the palate with a full body and polished tannins. Long finish with an array of ripe-berry flavors. Drink or hold [into early 2030s]. Score - 92. (jamessuckling.com, March 3, 2022)

Name: Joel Gott 815 Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The grapes for this cross-California Cabernet are sourced from prime sites in places such as Napa, Lake County, Monterey, Lodi, Paso Robles, Santa Ynez and Sonoma. Ripe and velvety with an alluring chocolate, smoky oak and prune fruit with herbal and cedar notes. A brilliant option for lamb burgers, slow-cooked red meats or a charcuterie platter.

Name: Domaine Hatzimichalis Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby; lifted aromas of smoke, cassis, earth and leather; extra dry, medium to full-bodied, flavours of cassis, toasty oak, earth and spice notes on the finish.

Name: Joliesse Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: A great value in California Cabernet (or any Cabernet, for that matter). There's notable attention here to crafting a wine with good balance and ripeness. Look for dark fruit, cherry, toast, an underlying sweet vanilla, and present but smooth, creamy tannins. This will be great with ribs or lamb burgers.

Name: Franzia Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: California's Franzia has mastered wine packaging and the 'positive flow' of wine: no oxygen can enter, which preserves freshness. Savour this full-bodied wine for up to six weeks! Enticing aromas of red fruit, jam and vanilla, backed by balanced tannins and a dry finish. Enjoy with burgers served with coleslaw and beans.

Name: Ringbolt Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: The Ringbolt was a ship that sank during the 1800s off the rugged Australian coast near Margaret River, now a premium wine region. This elegant Cabernet goes down beautifully! Serve with oven-roasted top sirloin, grilled sausages or hearty lamb stew.

Name: Victoria Park Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This deeply-coloured wine hails from South Australia, and takes its name from a park honouring Princess Victoria, before she became Queen. Expect the fruit character of warm climate cabernet sauvignon; prune and floral aromas and flavours, with notes of smoke, mint and black olive. Pair with grilled burgers or ribs.

Name: Bonanza California Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: This is a multi-vintage blend from Chuck Wagner, who is the mastermind behind the iconic Caymus Special Selection. Ripe, almost sweet fruit, spice, cassis, smoke and chocolate make this take on California as rewarding as it is unique. Pair with ribs in a spicy sauce.

Name: Caliterra Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Ruby red colour; lifted chocolate, herbs, smoke and prune aromas; medium to full-bodied with chocolate, smoke and prune flavours; well-balanced with a medium finish.

Name: Henry Of Pelham Cabernet Merlot VQA
Description: Deep ruby/purple colour; berries, vanilla, toast, cedar and bell pepper aromas and flavours; dry, medium-bodied, well balanced with a rounded, generous palate with a rich texture and long finish.

Name: Concha y Toro Winemaker's Lot 148 CarmÈnËre
Description: Produced exclusively for the Canadian market, this is loaded with cassis, chocolate, licorice and cedar with a notable campfire complexity. Characterfully dense and seriously structured with plush tannins and touches of spice. Great for ribs or veal medallions.

Name: Villa Conchi Brut Seleccion
Description: This award-winning Spanish sparkler from Villa Conchi is bright gold in colour and has upfront aromas and flavours of mellow spice, quince and citrus with a minerally tone. Medium-bodied with supportive acidity and a refreshingly clean finish, this is perfect as a starter or enjoy with light appetizers.

Name: 19 Crimes Martha's Chard
Description: 19 Crimes partnered with the legendary cooking and lifestyle guru Martha Stewart to produce a multi-purpose wine. Just like everything Martha touches is golden, so is the pour on this flavour-packed chardonnay. Citrus, oak, and caramel tones with a long-lasting finish. Pair with a lobster roll or enjoy as an aperitif.

Name: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Chardonnay
Description: The colour is a bright pale lemon; aromas of ripe pear and buttered toast are joined by hints of spicy vanilla; the wine is extra dry and medium-bodied with balanced acidity framing notes  of ripe pear, toast and vanilla; a medium length finish, with honey and toasted oak notes balanced by lemony acidity.

Name: Francis Coppola Diamond Collection Chardonnay
Description: This Chardonnay shows buttered popcorn, pear, orange, melon, apple, pineapple and grilled mango framed by well-integrated, balanced oak spices. Vibrant, fresh and toasty. A winner with barbecued chicken or Cornish hen.

Name: Flat Rock Chardonnay VQA
Description: Ontario has seen its international reputation for quality cool-climate Chardonnay soar. If you're still looking for somewhere to build your own opinion, you'll be hard pressed to find a sounder foundation than this Flat Rock. Vibrant, with brioche toast, yellow plum, spice and herbs, it's rock solid. Pair with crab legs or grilled chicken.

Name: Pelee Island Lola Chardonnay VQA
Description: Lola first arrived as a ros√© and won our hearts; now you can try their food-friendly chardonnay. It has appealing notes of apple, melon, citrus and spice. This wine is aromatic and flavourful with a long-lasting finish. Pair it with grilled halibut over a bed of rice, or a soft cheese plate with crackers and grapes.

Name: Bread & Butter Chardonnay
Description: Based in California, Bread & Butter makes approachable wines. This memorable chardonnay opens with vanilla bean and almond notes, along with crisp minerality and a hint of tropical fruit. It's medium-bodied with a hint of oak leading to a long, buttery finish. Goes well with creamy pasta, roasted vegetables and seafood.

Name: Villa Maria Private Bin Chardonnay East Coast
Description: Villa Maria is New Zealand's most awarded winery, and fully committed to sustainability. This is a fruit-forward chardonnay with notable balance and freshness. Fresh fig, smoke, vanilla, pear and nutty flavours enhanced by a creamy texture on a medium-plus body. Enjoy with seafood, creamy pasta dishes or with appetizers.

Name: La Crema Sonoma Coast Chardonnay
Description: Cooling ocean breezes and morning fogs have helped the Sonoma Coast become one of the world's premier appellations for Chardonnay. This one is ripe and generous with notes of shortbread, vanilla, ripe pear with toast and nutty elements. Perfect for grilled pork chops or roast chicken.

Name: Trius Chardonnay VQA
Description: Bright medium lemon yellow, with lemon/gold highlights; clean, forward aromas of toasted oak, lemon and roasted nuts, with a vanilla and yellow plum notes; extra dry with soft but balanced acidity, citrus, nutty and spicy oak notes on a medium length finish.

Name: Laurent Miquel Pere Et Fils Chardonnay d'Oc
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, yellow pear, stony, herbal and melon aromas; extra dry, medium body, well balanced, with matching pear and melon flavours on the lingering finish.

Name: Konzelmann Chardonnay Unoaked VQA
Description: Bright yellow-gold colour; green plums, herbal, yeast and citrus fruit with nutty notes; medium-bodied with a refreshing, citrus finish.

Name: Sebastiani Vineyards Chardonnay
Description: This complex, ripe Chardonnay comes from the fog-cooled Carneros region and is crisp and bright, with fresh acidity, ripe peach, lemon, apricot and vanilla tones. A wine for grilled chicken or meaty fish.

Name: Trinity Oaks Chardonnay
Description: Partnering with Trees for the Future, a nonprofit that's planted over 180 million trees, Trinity Oaks plants one tree per bottle purchased. The grapes come from sustainably farmed vineyards. Its juicy citrus and pear flavours, hints of oak toast and vanilla and silky finish pair nicely with chicken pot pie or creamy pasta.

Name: Chloe Chardonnay
Description: Medium lemon in colour; delicate aromas of vanilla and melon with floral tones; the palate is extra-dry and medium-bodied with flavours of vanilla, melon, honey and pear with a creamy texture.

Name: Jackson-Triggs Chardonnay
Description: Pale straw colour; light citrus and floral aroma with berry tones; these plus nutty-smoky touches on the palate, extra dry with a touch of spice in the finish.

Name: The Pavillion Chenin Blanc
Description: Clear pale lemon colour; lifted aromas of mushrooms, citrus and spice with mineral notes; extra dry, medium bodied with medium balanced acidity and flavours of mushrooms, citrus, spice and a note minerality.

Name: Castello di Gabbiano Chianti Classico DOCG
Description: Medium ruby colour; aromas and flavours of chocolate, dark fruit and gentle baking spice, with prune and honey notes; dry, medium-bodied, structured tannins and refreshing acidity.

Name: Ruffino Chianti
Description: Ruffino's original wine, and one of the world's most recognized Tuscan wines. The wine is extra dry, medium-bodied and well-structured. Enjoy aromas and flavours of chestnut, leather, rye bread and red berry fruit, with spicy notes and a touch of pepper.  Serve with wild boar ragu, grilled steak or roasted vegetables.

Name: Brigaldara Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2017
Description: This is a spectacular amarone that finds great equilibrium and finesse despite its 16.5% alcohol. The nose is not over the top exuberant but it captures very ripe dried cran-cherry fruit with vermouth spices and rosemary like herbality. It is full bodied and rich, but very streamlined and elegant across the mid-palate, and finishing with outstanding flavour depth and length. Tasted Feb 2022. Score - 96. (David Lawrason, winealign.com)

Name: Allegrini Palazzo della Torre 2019
Description: Intense nose with hints of coffee and black chocolate to the raspberry jam and dark cherries. Nicely dry and bitter with dark-chocolate character that extends to the long, polished finish with silky tannins. Drink or hold. Score - 93. (jamessuckling.com, Sept. 6, 2022)

Name: Girls' Night Out Very Berry Bomba
Description: Deep pink colour; strawberry and fruit punch aromas; medium sweet, light bodied; sweet fruit punch flavours

Name: Girls' Night Out Strawberry Samba
Description: The perfect accompaniment for good friends, great food and sunny afternoons. Candied strawberry, berry preserve and watermelon aromas, and flavours of ripe berries and juicy watermelon. Serve with grilled jumbo shrimp, guacamole or watermelon and feta skewers.

Name: Girls' Night Out Pineapple Mango Tango
Description: clear, pale straw colour; pineapple and grapefruit aromas; matching sweet pineapple and and grapefruit flavours

Name: Muskoka Lakes Blueberry Wine
Description: Opaque, ruby red in colour with pronounced aromas of blueberry and table grapes; the palate is medium-sweet with low acid and obvious jammy blueberry and earthy flavours followed by a medium-length finish.

Name: Cave Spring Gamay VQA
Description: Light ruby red colour; lots of fresh red and black plum aromas with notes of citrus, berries and nuts on the nose; extra dry, medium-plus bodied, with round, ripe plum and berry fruit flavour and fresh finish.

Name: Pisse-Dru Beaujolais
Description: The quirky name of this wine is an old expression describing how readily juice runs from well-ripened grapes. Its light-plus bodied, food-friendly, with appealing plum, nutty, spice and red fruit flavours and balanced, dry finish. A straightforward, juicy and reliable accompaniment for burgers, cold chicken or charcuterie.

Name: Fiol Prosecco DOC
Description: Clear pale straw colour with persistent bubbles; aromas of pear, citrus and green apple with notes of white flowers and banana; dry, light to medium bodied, balanced acidity, flavours of green apple, pear and citrus, with notes of almond, bread and yeast.

Name: Villa Sandi Prosecco Il Fresco DOC, Treviso
Description: Fine Italian bubbly. Pours a pale lemon with delicate, persistent bubbles. Lifted aromas and flavours of ripe pear and cantaloupe, hints of spice with light floral notes. Dry and elegant on the palate with refreshing yeasty hint on the cleansing finish. The perfect aperitif and a great match to antipasti or light shellfish.

Name: Brotte La Fiole CdRhone AOC
Description: Clear medium ruby colour; upfront aromas of red plums, blackberries, raspberries, watermelon and herbs de Provence; extra dry and medium bodied with flavours of plums, berries, herbs and spices; medium finish, ready to drink.

Name: M. Chapoutier Les Vignes de Bila-Haut C√¥tes du Roussillon-Villages
Description: From the legendary Michel Chapoutier, this is a consistently highly rated wine that reliably delivers big flavour in an intense yet elegant package. Look for bold floral, dried fig and ginger fruit, with herbal and smoky notes. Great for burgers, ribs or lamb.

Name: Argento Estate Organic Malbec
Description: Bright ruby red colour; toasted oak, nuts, sweet plum compote and honey aromas with hints of violets and herbs; dry, medium bodied, with balanced medium acidity and silky tannins supporting flavours of roasted nuts and ripe black fruits.

Name: La Linda Private Selection Old Vines Malbec
Description: Renowned for malbec, Bosca is one of Argentina's best-known wineries. La Linda is the pure expression of fruit, a result of 30-year-old vines and judicious use of oak ageing. Deep ruby, with aromas of chocolate, herbs, prune, honey and nuts. The wine is medium-full bodied, with balanced acidity and fine, ripe tannins.

Name: Trapiche Pure Malbec
Description: Trapiche is Argentina's leading exporter of wine. This malbec shows a commitment to pure fruit flavours. An opaque, deep ruby with purple hues; upfront aromas of berry melange, rye bread crust, red fruit, plus hints of bloor orange. The palate is dry, finely textured and brimming with flavours of plum, blackberry and spice.

Name: Santa Carolina Merlot
Description: Deep brick red colour; Rich, upfront plummy, blood orange and blackberry fruit aromas and flavours with notes of chocolate, earth and spice; extra dry, medium-bodied with moderate tannins.

Name: Josh Cellars Merlot
Description: Joseph Carr Winery makes a tier of wines named after his affable father Josh. Josh Merlot, in turn, is inviting and full of character. With aromas and flavours of dark fruit, cedar and spice, a velvety texture, and fine tannins on the finish, this red will complement lamb, meat-based pasta or soft cheeses. Cheers Josh!

Name: Konzelmann Merlot VQA
Description: Ruby colour; floral, red fruit, nuts, toast and vanilla aroma; matching flavours, balanced; medium body.

Name: Pelee Island Merlot
Description: Pelee Island Winery is located in Canada's warmest and most southerly grape growing region. This wine is dry, medium-bodied with medium acidity and noticeable tannins. Toasted oak, nuts, and ripe berry flavours with a hint of herbs and cedar on a smooth finish. Serve with barbecued chicken, burgers or grilled vegetables.

Name: Masi Modello Merlot Trevenezie IGT
Description: A charming, merlot-based red, that's crafted in a food friendly, easy drinking style. Medium ruby red in colour. Shows upfront aromas and flavours of toast, coffee and prune with notes of spice. On the palate, it's dry, light to medium bodied and well balanced, with soft tannins. Great paired with salumi or roasted meat.

Name: Lacour Tourny Bordeaux Merlot Cabernet
Description: An attractive, everyday Bordeaux at a great price. It's crafted using merlot, the dominant grape in the blend, and cabernet sauvignon. The two together make a harmonious wine. Expect plum, cherry, raspberry, oak and herbal tones. It's full-bodied and smooth with a long finish. Pair with lamb chops and grilled vegetables.

Name: Era Montepulciano D'Abruzzo DOC Organic
Description: Medium ruby colour; floral, prune, nuts, toast and raisins aromas; medium-bodied with plum/prune fruit, nuts and raisins flavours.

Name: Oggi Botter Moscato Frizzante IGT
Description: pale straw with green highlights; floral, peach, grape and citrus aromas; off-dry with soft spritz; sweet melon, grape and citrus flavours

Name: Voga Moscato Frizzante IGT
Description: Pale straw colour with light effervesence; aromas of macadamia nuts, elderflower, ginger, melon and citrus; medium-sweet and mid-bodied, with soft bubbles and delightful fruit salad flavours.

Name: Good Natured Merlot Gamay Noir VQA
Description: This delightful VQA red consists of merlot and gamay noir grapes. Anticipate notes of cherry, plum, blackberry and spice. It's medium-bodied and fruity on the palate with silky tannins, leading you to a lengthy finish. Well-suited for pork loin beside scalloped potatoes, seared tuna steaks or a cheese platter.

Name: XOXO Pinot Grigio Sangria
Description: This is a fresh and lively alternative to classic red sangria brimming with lifted mango, pineapple and citrus fruit all floating on a fine fizz. A great addition to any occasion! Serve with salty snacks or fruit cocktails.

Name: Ascheri Barolo 2017
Description: Blue flower, truffle and ripe berry aromas form the inviting nose along with a whiff of camphor. Smooth and savory, the full-bodied palate delivers raspberry compote, ripe Morello cherry and baking spice alongside tightly woven, polished tannins. Drink 2024-2029. Score - 93. (Kerin O'Keefe, Wine Enthusiast, Nov. 1, 2021)

Name: Cusumano Nero D'Avola Sicilia DOC
Description: deep ruby colour; dark fruit with coffee and spice aromas; dry, medium body; cherry and plum flavours with balanced acidity; ripe tannins in soft medium length finish

Name: Pelee Island Pinot Grigio
Description: A perfect addition when hosting, this offering has lively aromas and flavours of nuts, fresh fig, herbs and toast. Medium-bodied and fresh, it finishes with vibrant acidity and echoes the nuts and fig notes.

Name: Mezzacorona Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; fresh, berry, cantaloupe and fruity pear nose with a touch of spice; medium body, clean and fresh with berry and melon flavours and pear and spice on the finish.

Name: Voga Pinot Grigio IGT
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted aromas and flavours of nuts, sourdough bread and citrus fruit; extra dry, light to medium weight with soft acidity.

Name: Peller Family Vineyards Pinot Grigio
Description: Easy drinking, refreshing white wine, sourced from vineyards in Canada and around the world. Shows aromas of cantaloupe, yellow berries and pear with a hint of chocolate. Extra dry, medium-bodied with refreshing melon, berries and pear flavours. Perfect for casual sipping or pair with light fare, salads and appetizers.

Name: Jackson-Triggs Pinot Grigio
Description: From an award-winning winery comes this light and lively pinot grigio, offered in a range of sizes for all occasions. Pouring a pale lemon colour, look for aromas and flavours of lifted, fresh cantaloupe, ginger and spice. Moderate acidity makes this fresh, it is extra-dry on that palate with a clean finish.

Name: Argento Estate Bottled Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; peach and tropical fruit aromas; extra dry palate with medium body and crisp flavours.

Name: G. Marquis The Red Line Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Straw yellow colour; floral, citrus, smoky and nutty aromas; extra dry, medium-plus body; round citrus, smoke, nuts and fresh fig flavours with fresh finish.

Name: Cavit Collection Pinot Grigio DOC Venezie
Description: Sustainably grown in mountainous northern Italy, this is a best-selling pinot grigio, with flavours of green pear, light floral element, cantaloupe and quince. It's light-plus bodied, extra dry and notably food-friendly. Serve well-chilled as an aperitif, or serve with pasta, veal, chicken or seafood.

Name: Ciao Pinot Grigio Organic Carton
Description: A lovely, easy-drinking wine available in a lightweight, environmentally friendly package. Youthful, light straw colour. Fruity yellow pear and white melon on the nose with bright floral and mineral overtones. The palate is fresh and focused with appealing flavours of pear and melon and lightly spicy/minerally notes.

Name: Barone Montalto Pinot Grigio
Description: Barone Montalto has been making consumer-friendly wines since 2000. Anticipate lovely notes of grapefruit, pear, and white peach. On the palate, it reveals notes of lemon drop and fresh green herbs. It's light-bodied with lively acidity and a refreshingly crisp finish. Pair alongside mushroom risotto a charcuterie board.

Name: Folonari Pinot Grigio Delle Venezie DOC
Description: Made in stainless steel tanks to preserve and accentuate its fresh character. Pale lemon colour, with inviting aromas of bread dough, nuts, citrus and light floral notes. Juicy on the palate with fresh fruit flavours matched by balanced acidity and hints of minerality that lead to a clean finish.

Name: McGuigan Black Label Pinot Grigio
Description: McGuigan Pinot Grigio offers good varietal character with nuts, fresh bread, grapefruit, floral and spice aromas and a balanced dry palate. Relatively low in acidity and light-plus in body, the palate offers flavours of nuts and grapefruit with a pleasing touch of spice on the finish.

Name: Yellow Tail Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas of nuts, floral note, spice, mushrooms and herbs; dry, medium bodied, with mellow acidity, and delicate flavours of herbs and nuts.

Name: Mindful Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: This delightful pinot grigio bursts with aromas and flavours of ripe peach, pear, and apple, along with hints of melon and white flower. Light-bodied and crisp with a long-lasting finish. Enjoy with coconut lentil curry or avocado pesto pasta.

Name: Angels Gate Pinot Gris VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted, fig and  smoke aromas with hints of pear and nuts;  extra dry and fresh with a nice balance of fruit and acidity on the palate.

Name: Bread & Butter Pinot Noir
Description: Based in California's Napa Valley, Bread & Butter makes easy-going and approachable wines for everyday occasions year round. This pinot noir shows generous fruit with notes of oak toast, mixed berries and red plum. Floral and nutty hints grace a long, silky finish. Serve with grilled salmon, duck breast or mushroom risotto.

Name: Belle Glos Clark & Telephone Pinot Noir 2019
Description: The 2019 Pinot Noir Clark & Telephone is a potent, heady wine. Black cherry, plum, chocolate, spice and leather give this opulent Pinot tons of fruit intensity and pure volume. Martini clone Pinot lends quite a bit of aromatic complexity to this juicy, flamboyant Pinot. Rose petal, lavender and spice linger. Belle Glos is Joe Wagner's Pinot Noir project. The wines are made from sites throughout California. Readers should expect bold, sumptuous Pinots built on richness and overt fruit. It's a style that works best where sites naturally produce that style of fruit. Drinking window: 2023-2031. Score - 92. (Antonio Galloni, vinous.com, Jan. 2022)

Name: 13th Street Burger Blend Gamay Noir Pinot Noir VQA
Description: This offering from the award-winning winery is a blend of gamay and pinot noir. This wine pours bright ruby and it has vibrant aromas and flavours of lifted spice and red fruit, cured meats and watermelon. Medium-bodied, dry, with finely textured tannins, this is ideal for grilled burgers and French fries.

Name: The Wanted Zin Old Vines Zinfandel IGT
Description: You'll want this Italian zinfandel in your collection. Deep ruby with a garnet rim. Upfront aromas of prune, toasty oak, chocolate, and honey. It's full-bodied and fruity with a juicy mid-palate filled with flavours of dried fruit, toast, chocolate and spice, fine tannins, and a lingering finish. Try with ribs or burgers.

Name: Blu Giovello Prosecco
Description: The prosecco in the distinctive blue bottle. In the glass, it has bright aromas and flavours of white fruit - quince, starfruit, with a touch of nuts, honey and fresh pear. The palate is dry and refreshing with lively bubbles and Asian pear and tangy quince notes on the finish. Great on its own or paired with appetizers.

Name: Zonin Cuv√©e 1821 Prosecco DOC Brut
Description: Zone in on this lovely Prosecco. Pale straw with aromas and flavours of pear, melon, apple, and lime, along with a delicate floral note. It's light-bodied and fruity, with a soft spritz leading to a refreshingly crisp finish. Pair alongside fresh fruit and cheese platter, fruit flan, or enjoy as a starter.

Name: Astoria Prosecco
Description: Pale straw, light mousse; lifted, floral, yeasty and Asian pear aromas; dry, elegant with pleasant fruit flavours.

Name: Atelier Red, PGI Achaia
Description: The Mavro Kalavritino and Cabernet Sauvignon grapes are grown in the mountainous Corinthian Gulf region of the Peloponnese. The varietals are vinified separately, blended then aged in oak. Resulting in black and red berry fruit with notes of chocolate, vanilla and spice with firm tannins. Pair with meat stews.

Name: Silk & Spice Red
Description: Portugal's heritage of exploration is celebrated in this easy-drinking red blend. Deep ruby, with aromas of black plum and berry reduction and lifted honeyed and spicy notes. On the palate, Silk & Spice lives up to its name; soft, supple and approachable, dry, with plum, jammy and spicy flavours.

Name: Hopetown Wine Co. Hill House Craft Red VQA
Description: This medium-bodied VQA red shows concentrated aromas of mint, mocha, and plum. It displays ripe flavours of juicy red currant and blackberry and a fine-grained silky finish. Pair it with a hearty lamb stew or pasta with red sauce.

Name: Diabolica Red VQA
Description: This devilishly flavourful red is bursting with upfront chocolate and prune aromas. Medium-bodied, with mellow acidity, the palate reveals layers of chocolate, prune preserve, smoke and mineral flavours. Soft and silky it finishes with a note reminiscent of Black Forest cake.

Name: Pelee Pebbles Red
Description: Clear medium ruby in colour; aromas of ripe plum and black pepper, with underlying floral and herbal notes; extra dry and medium-bodied, with medium acidity and tannins; flavours of red plum with light spicy notes on a medium-length finish.

Name: Novas Gran Reserva Carm√©n√®re Cab Sauvignon Organic
Description: Deep ruby colour; bursting with aromas of chocolate, cassis, licorice and smoky oak; extra-dry, medium to full-bodied; predominant flavours of chocolate, cassis, spice and smoke; ripe, coating tannins and a warm lasting finish.

Name: Porta 6 Lisboa VR
Description: This fragrant, ripe and juicy red offers heady aromas of violets, coffee and dark fruit; the palate is medium-bodied, supple and dry with chewy tannins and flavours of coffee, blackberry, black plum, watermelon and herbs on a medium length finish.

Name: La Vieille Ferme Luberon Blanc AOC
Description: In 1970 Jean-Pierre Perrin of the French winemaking Perrins, applied his know-how to create a tier of value, good quality wines under this label. Aromas of fresh pastry, yellow pear, peach and honey, mirrored on the extra dry, moderate acidity palate, leading to a fresh finish. Enjoy with roast chicken or soft cheeses.

Name: Megalomaniac Local Squeeze White VQA
Description: Pale yellow colour; aromas of pine nuts, fresh quince, tobacco, mineral and citrus; dry and medium in body with crisp quince, nutty and citrus notes; medium finish.

Name: Sandbanks Summer Ros√© VQA
Description: Established in Prince Edward County in 2001, Sandbanks Winery joined forces with Arterra Wines Canada in 2020. Their Summer Ros√© bursts with strawberry, mango and watermelon notes. It is lightly fizzy with a touch of sweetness. Enjoy with grilled shrimp in a garlic butter sauce or baked Camembert with balsamic strawberries.

Name: La Vieille Ferme Rose Ventoux AOC
Description: Grapes grown on the slopes of France's Mont Ventoux ripen slowly at cooler temperatures, maintaining fruit flavours and fresh acidity. This wine is pale rose in colour, with upfront aromas of watermelon and red fruit. Extra dry and medium-bodied, with melon and red fruit flavours. Serve chilled with tarragon chicken.

Name: Domaine Lafage Miraflors Rose Cotes Du Roussillon AOC
Description: Named after an old estate in the heart of Domaine Lafage. The combination of mourvedre and old vine grenache gris is aged in tank before bottling. The result is a pale salmon colour with an elegant bouquet of roses, strawberry and white peach, leading to a clean and pure palate that ends with crisp, refreshing flavours.

Name: Speck Bros. Three of Hearts Ros√© VQA
Description: Made by Henry of Pelham, this Pinot Noir/Pinot Gris blend underwent cool fermentation in stainless steel to preserve the delicacy and precision of the fruit. The result is a food-friendly wine with bright, vivid red plum, ripe berry, nuts, mushroom and smoke. A fresh, lifted, balanced wine that would be excellent as a sipper or paired with grilled seafood or roast chicken.

Name: Kim Crawford Ros√©
Description: Hawke's Bay is one of New Zealand's oldest wine regions and classic Bordeaux varietals do exceptionally well there. This ros√© is made from Merlot and Malbec and will offer pink grapefruit, red currant, floral, red plum and candy notes. Perfect for summer salads or grilled seafood.

Name: Cono Sur Sparkling Ros√©
Description: Pale salmon colour; aromas of nuts, pink graprefruit, watermelon and hints of earth and smoke; on the palate it is dry with moderate acidity and light to medium bodied; the flavours reflect nutty, citrus and melon fruit detected on the nose with a clean finish.

Name: Jackson-Triggs Proprietors' Rose
Description: This radiant ros√©, offered in this convenient package, comes from an award-winning winery, great for all your occasions. Pours medium pink with aromas and flavours of plum jam, strawberry, cherry. It's easygoing and fruity with a crisp finish. Serve with cr√™pes or grilled shrimp.

Name: Sogrape Mateus Ros√©
Description: Mateus Ros√©, in the iconic flask-shaped bottle, has introduced generations to the world of wine with a fresh, lightly sparkling and versatile style. Pale salmon in colour with floral, red currant, lightly yeasty aromas and flavours. Dry, lightly sparkling with a flavourful, soft finish; serve well-chilled with appetizers.

Name: Wayne Gretzky Ros√© VQA
Description: Wayne Gretzky Estate Winery and Distillery expanded into a state-of-the-art facility in the heart of Niagara-On -the-Lake wine country in 2017. This delicate ros√© has aromas of peach, citrus and strawberry that move to flavours of red berries, plum and cherry with a slightly off-dry finish. Pair with vegetable quiche.

Name: Jacob's Creek Moscato Ros√©
Description: Jacob's Creek Moscato is a fresh and fragrant, low alcohol Australian ros√©. It has aromas and flavours of ripe raspberry, strawberry and candied fruit with pear and sherbet notes. The palate is lightly sweet with a refreshing spritz and vibrant red berries on the finish. Sip on its own, with fresh fruit, soft cheese or BBQ.

Name: Adobe Reserva Ros√© Organic
Description: A vibrant, mouth-watering, organic ros√© from Chile. In the glass, it shows forward aromas and flavours of wild strawberries, cherry, melon and plum. The palate is medium-bodied and fresh with tart berry notes on the finish. Quite versatile. Enjoy as an aperitif or pair with seafood, pasta, sandwiches and chicken salad.

Name: Two Oceans Light Keeper Blushing Ros√©
CastelGiocondo Brunello di Montalcino
Description: Montalcino's long growing season creates Brunellos that are luxurious and age-worthy, like this one, with its flavours of cedar, red fruit, leather, flowers and chestnut. Decant for two hours and serve with rare steaks or roast leg of lamb, or cellar for up to 10 years.

Name: Ruffino Il Ducale Toscana IGP
Description: An innovative blend of the traditional sangiovese with merlot and syrah. It pours a medium ruby red colour and shows bright aromas and flavours of berries - raspberry, cherry, plum and licorice with a minerally streak. The palate is dry, with soft balanced acidity and fine tannins. Great with herbed white meats.

Name: Le Volte dell'Ornellaia
Description: Just name-dropping 'Tenuta dell'Ornellaia' is sure to get any red-blooded wine connoisseur's pulse to quicken. This is an elegant, sleek, polished wine showing chocolate, floral, fresh fig, honey and smoky notes. Perfect for roasted or braised meats.

Name: Rodney Strong Charlotte's Home Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The Charlotte's Home Sauvignon Blanc vineyard was established in 1971, and fruit from this site continues to be the basis for this wine. It's fresh and mellow, with nutty notes, citrus, vanilla, toast and golden berries. A great wine for salads, seafood or creamy goat cheese.

Name: The Ned Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The Ned is classic New Zealand-style sauvignon blanc. Clear pale lemon in colour; pronounced aromas of quince, citrus, herbs and spice; on the palate, extra-dry, with medium-minus acidity and medium-plus body; flavours of fresh quince, citrus and herbs with a mineral note.

Name: Oyster Bay Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Popular Oyster Bay hails from the Marlborough region, ground zero for classic New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc. Expect notes of expressive citrus, yellow berries melange and fresh herbs with mineral notes. Pair with sea scallops pan-fried in butter with asparagus on the side.

Name: Kim Crawford Illuminate Sauvignon Blanc
Description: New Zealand is at the forefront of lower-calorie, lower-alcohol wines. This one is produced using spinning cone distillation: a gentle process that doesn't use pressure or high temperatures and so has less impact on the aroma and flavour of the final wine. This fresh, aromatic Savvy shows tropical fruit, citrus and herbs and is perfect for seafood.

Name: Marlborough Ridge Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Marlborough wines show balance and pure flavours. A blend of fruit from Wairau Valley, showing aromas of passion fruit, with floral and crushed nettle hints. The palate delivers passion fruit, floral and herbal flavours with notes of mango and peach, with long, balanced finish. Serve with grilled fish or fresh tomato salad.

Name: Deakin Estate Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale yellow in colour with aromas bread dough, floral lift and grapefruit; the palate is medium-bodied with moderate acidity and flavours of lees, grapefruit, mint and honey followed by a clean finish.

Name: Two Oceans Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; quince, citrus, minerally and yeasty aromas; extra dry, medium bodied, easy drinking with soft lingering quince and citrus flavours.

Name: Casas del Bosque Reserva Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Founded in 1993, Casas del Bosque was one of the first wineries in the cool Casablanca Valley. Fresh, mellow and wonderfully aromatic, this offers upfront suggestions of gooseberry, bell pepper, citrus and minerals. Pungent and versatile, enjoy on its own, or with grilled fish or smoked salmon.

Name: Santa Carolina Reserva Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Sauvignon blanc continues to grow in popularity - its crisp flavours and versatility at the table have made it Ontario's go-to wine for entertaining. Lightly yeasty, grapefruit and savory aromas followed by those of green apples and herbs; ripe citrus flavours. Serve with grilled fish, seafood pasta or vegetarian dishes.

Name: Yealands Sauvignon Blanc Marlborough
Description: Yealands is gaining notoriety for consistently producing quality wines at affordable prices. In the glass this straw coloured wine offers cassis, floral, gooseberry and herbal aromas; the palate is extra dry, medium-plus bodied; bright cassis and gooseberry flavours and a refreshingly clean finish.

Name: Wayne Gretzky Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Wayne Gretzky's success in the wine world the result of hard work, dedication, and teamwork, evident with this intriguing and aromatic sauvignon blanc. Teeming with aromas of white grapefruit and gooseberry, the palate shows classic grassy notes and well-balanced acidity. Pair with basil pesto pasta or spinach quiche.

Name: Tierra Rica Sauvignon Blanc Organic
Description: The Coastal vineyards in Chile highlight the best of the Sauvignon Blanc grape. This expressive wine is produced using sustainable and organic practices, featuring aromas of citrus fruit, bell pepper and herbs with a crisp and refreshing minerality. Enjoy it on its own, or with seafood pasta and grilled vegetables.

Name: Josh Cellars Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Made from grapes sourced from premium California growing areas. Quite aromatic and bright, with flavours of ripe pear, fresh fig, chamomile and gooseberry with an herbal note. On the palate, this is medium bodied, smooth and balanced with a soft and refreshing finish. Pair with herbed seafood or white meat.

Name: Vi√±a Tarapac√° Reserva Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Vina Tarapaca is committed to economic, social, and environmental sustainability practices in and outside of the vineyard. Their energetic sauvignon blanc is bright gold in colour, displaying notes of tropical fruit, citrus zest, and lemongrass. The dry finish and crisp acidity make it a great match with salads or seafood.

Name: Peller Family Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Crisp, easy drinking white in an easy to serve box. It's a pale, lemon green colour. Shows forward aromas of grapefruit, floral note, spice, herbs, cantaloupe and green apple. The palate is extra dry, medium-bodied and bright with grapefruit, herbs and melon flavours. Pair with lighter herb-based dishes and salads.

Name: Bask Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Enjoy a fresh, dry and flavourful sauvignon blanc; low in sugar and brimming with flavour. Bask is energetic and fresh on the palate with long-lasting fragrant herbal and grapefruit taste. Serve with salads, grilled vegetables or your favourite casual cuisine.

Name: Black Cellar Shiraz Cabernet
Description: The Black Cellars winemaker explored numerous blends deep within the heart of the cellar until perfection was achieved. The ultimate blend combines upfront flavours of black currant, floral and jammy notes with a touch of mint chocolate and a smooth mouthfeel that exemplifies the mystique of Black Cellar.

Name: Wolf Blass Red Label Shiraz Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Deep ruby purple colour; extra dry and medium-bodied with medium tannins; lifted aromas and flavours of coffee with cream, black plum reduction, honey and herbs; long finish.

Name: Penfolds Koonunga Hill Shiraz/Cabernet
Description: First crafted in 1976, this classic Australian blend of Shiraz and Cabernet has always been a favourite. Supple and concentrated, with toast, cedar, black plum, vanilla and herbal tones, it's a wine with broad appeal. It will be superb with pepper steak or grilled ribs.

Name: Bodacious Smooth Red
Description: Medium ruby in colour; aromas of sweet plum, nutella, blood orange, and candied berries; medium-sweet with the same flavours as on the nose.

Name: Hardys Stamp Series Shiraz Cabernet Sauvignon
Description: Black cherry colour with floral, plumy and vanilla aromas and notes of toasted oak and herbs; medium body, plum and vanilla flavours with a hint of toast in the finish.

Name: Hardys Stamp Series Shiraz Cabernet
Description: Black cherry colour with floral, plumy and vanilla aromas and notes of toasted oak and herbs; medium body, plum and vanilla flavours with a hint of toast in the finish.

Name: Kilikanoon Killerman's Run Shiraz
Description: This Shiraz is Kilikanoon's idea of an entry-level wine. Some introduction! A hedonistic pleasure, it's plush with apricot and black plum jam, floral lift and mixed berries fruit. A bold match for barbecued spareribs, spicy sausage pizza or grilled hanger steaks.

Name: Two Hands Gnarly Dudes Shiraz
Description: Named for the fierce and twisted-looking old vines from which the grapes are sourced, Gnarly Dudes is a tightly focused wine with intense lifted notes of black plum, smoke, chocolate and vanilla. Big and bold, it's a finely crafted powerhouse Shiraz. Enjoy with grilled steaks.

Name: Peninsula Ridge Shiraz VQA
Description: Clear ruby with violet at the rim; floral and berry marmalade aromas with spice and prune notes; medium body with berry preserve flavour and soft oak spice to finish.

Name: Wolf Blass Yellow Label Shiraz
Description: Inky purple; lifted notes of red fruit, rye bread, mulberry and fresh mushrooms; the medium-bodied palate explodes with red fruit and berry, and leads to a pleasing rich finish.

Name: Wyndham Estate Bin 555 Shiraz
Description: Deep purple colour; spicy fruit bouquet of coffee, prune, smoke, licorice and a floral note; smoky black fruit flavours with a long, full finish.

Name: Yellow Tail Shiraz
Description: From Australia's largest family-owned wine company, a wine that's easy to drink, and easy to understand. It's dry, medium-bodied and softly structured, with aromas and flavours of coffee, floral note, prune, smoke and licorice. The ripe plummy-berry notes lead to a long, spicy finish. Serve with grilled lamb chops.

Name: Benjamin Bridge Nova 7 Sparkling
Description: The 'Nova' in this snappy sparkler's name is a nod to Nova Scotia, where it originates, and the '7' references its first vintage: 2007. This aromatic, pristine low-alcohol sparkler suggests complex wildflowers, lime, mango and green apple. The ample acidity contains and balances its sweet character. Serve lightly chilled with fresh fruit, or spicy fish tacos.

Name: Jacob's Creek Chardonnay Pinot Noir Sparkling
Description: Brilliant pale lemon colour; aromas of nuts, floral note, white grapefruit, herbs and pastry; extra dry, light to medium bodied, with refreshing flavours of citrus, toast and mineral.

Name: Henkell Trocken Piccolo
Description: Since its launch in 1856, Henkell has become Germany's most recognized sparkling wine brand. Lively effervescence accompanies citrus and fruit flavours. Enjoy light sweetness and a balanced finish. Ideal for entertaining; pair with appetizers, seafood, poultry or light, fruit-based desserts.

Name: Martini Asti
Description: Deliciously fragrant, low alcohol, sparkler made from moscato grown in the Asti vineyards of Piemonte. Shows aromas and flavours of apricot, peach and candied lemon with orange blossom tones. The palate is delicately sweet with lively bubbles and a crisp balanced finish. Enjoy on its own, pair with fresh fruit or panettone.

Name: Martini Asti
Description: Deliciously fragrant, low alcohol, sparkler made from moscato grown in the Asti vineyards of Piemonte. Shows aromas and flavours of apricot, peach and candied lemon with orange blossom tones. The palate is delicately sweet with lively bubbles and a crisp balanced finish. Enjoy on its own, pair with fresh fruit or panettone.

Name: Jackson-Triggs Sparkling Reserve VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; green pear, yeasty and bread pudding aromas with floral and fresh fig hints; dry, clean, refreshing palate with a fine cleansing mousse.

Name: Mumm Cuvee Napa Brut Prestige
Description: Established in California by France's leading international Champagne brand, Brut Prestige is Napa's signature sparkling wine. Enjoy floral, citrus and nutty flavours, followed by notes of herbs and brioche. Serve with shellfish, stuffed mushrooms or eggs benedict.

Name: Henkell Rose
Description: Light salmon colour; floral, red berry nose with red grapefruit, light nutty and chocolatey notes; extra dry with light citrus and berry fruit flavours and mineral notes in the finish.

Name: La Marca Prosecco Rose DOC
Description: Made partially with pinot noir grapes, this pretty in pink prosecco is a must-try. Pours salmon pink, with vibrant citrus notes, honeysuckle, peach, pear, red berry and cherry. It's medium-bodied and flavourful with an elegant finish. Serve with weekend brunch, grilled salmon, or on its own as an aperitif.

Name: Foss Marai Extra Dry
Description: Super popular with Vintages customers and dressed to impress, this lively sparkler is a delicious and smart choice (lower-alcohol) for any holiday party. Pour alongside appetizers like crab puffs, prosciutto with melon or scallops.

Name: Malivoire Che Bello Sparkling VQA
Description: Malivoire winery is always at the forefront of innovation. This gorgeous Italian-style sparkler is a blend of riesling, seyval blanc and vidal. It offers aroma and flavours of toast, nuts, citrus, herbs and fresh pear. Pair with smoked salmon, creamy cheese or your favourite brunch dish.

Name: Grande Cuvee 1531 De Aimery Cremant De Limoux
Description: Clear, pale yellow; lifted aromas of herbs, grapefruit, nuts and quince. The palate is extra dry and light to medium bodied with balanced acidity; look for flavours of herbs, citrus, nuts and quince followed by a cleansing finish.

Name: Gosset Grande Reserve Brut Champagne
Description: This classic Champagne is made from Chardonnay, Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier. Bright and golden in colour it offers very expressive aromas of fresh blackberry, raspberry and ginger. With a delicate mousse and minerality it displays a crisp, refreshing, lengthy finish. Serve as an aperitif or with fresh berries and cream.

Name: Segura Viudas Brut Rose D.O. Cava
Description: A lively, sparkling ros√©, made mostly with trepat, a rare red grape, found in north-eastern Spain. This example has strawberry, redcurrant, peach and floral notes. It's medium-bodied and flavourful, with a crisp finish. A superb option for weekend brunch.

Name: Juliet Prosecco Rose DOC
Description: A delightful prosecco ros√© showcasing aromas and flavours of red cherry, raspberry, passion fruit, and white flower. The medium-bodied and flavourful palate makes way for a crisp, clean finish. Pair with watermelon and Feta salad or enjoy as a pre-dinner delight.

Name: Calvet Brut Celebration Rose
Description: A lively and elegant sparker. It pours a bright pink with a fine mousse. Shows aromas and flavours of wild red berries, herb and floral tones. The palate is creamy and rounded, with refreshing bubbles, balanced acidity and light strawberry notes on the finish. Great as an aperitif or paired with appetizers and white meats.

Name: JP Chenet Ice White
Description: Easy-going sparkling wine in a visually stunning package. In the glass, it bursts with lifted aromas and flavours of freshly baked bread, yellow melon with floral tones and hints of minerality. A fresh and medium sweet palate with appealing bubbles. An elegant crowd-pleaser, it's made to be served well chilled or over ice.

Name: Blue Nun 24k Gold Edition Sparkling
Description: A delightful sparkler from Blue Nun that's fruity, fragrant and lightly sweet with a crisp and elegant finish. It contains real 24-carat gold leaf flakes, designed to highlight its natural effervescence and add even more festive flair. Help someone create golden moments this season with a gift of this distinctive bubbly.

Name: Toro Bravo Sparkling Secco White
Description: Hailing from Spain, this dry sparkling wine is created by the ever-so-popular Toro Bravo. It has lovely aromas and flavours of pear, peach, lemon, and vanilla. The wine is light-bodied and fruity with a palate-cleansing finish. Try as a starter or pair with grilled calamari beside a garlic aioli sauce, or a fruit platter.

Name: Gran Passione Prosecco DOC Spumante
Description: Botter is a key player in the Italian wine export market and the family behind the Gran Passione label. This sparkling wine from the Veneto region displays pretty orchard blossom aromas and bright citrus notes on the palate. Pair with a delicate cheese souffl√© or alongside Pitticelle di Zucchine (zucchini fritters).

Name: Smoky Bay Shiraz
Description: This sizzling shiraz from Australia bursts with aromas and flavours of black cherry, blackberry jam, cranberry, a touch of mint and toasty oak. It's medium-bodied and fruity with a silky finish. Pairs nicely with pepperoni pizza or beef stew with a side of mashed potatoes topped with crumbled peppercorn bacon.

Name: 19 Crimes Shiraz Durif
Description: Deep ruby in colour with a purple hue; aromas of coffee, dried fig, floral hint, jam and nutmeg; flavours replay on the aromas with an emphasis on coffee and fig that linger on the finish; moderate balanced acidity and supportive tannin.

Name: Nestor Avarino White
Description: Nestor Avarino White is made from Trebbiano, Moschofilero and Roditis grapes. Soft pale yellow in colour with green highlights, it has delicate aromas of citrus fruits with balanced acidity and a lengthy finish. Pairs perfectly with fish dishes as well as poultry and pasta.

Name: Folonari Valpolicella Classico DOC
Description: Valpolicella is the classic red wine of Italy's Veneto region; a blend of local grape varieties that combine to give forward fruit and a supple approachable structure. Ruby red in colour, with upfront spice and plum aromas. On the palate, expect a medium body, soft berry and plum flavours and a fresh, food-friendly finish.

Name: Folonari Valpolicella Classico DOC
Description: Valpolicella is the classic red wine of Italy's Veneto region; a blend of local grape varieties that combine to give forward fruit and a supple approachable structure. Ruby red in colour, with upfront spice and plum aromas. On the palate, expect a medium body, soft berry and plum flavours and a fresh, food-friendly finish.

Name: Negrar Valpolicella DOC
Description: This versatile red wine hails from the world-famous Valpolicella region. The wine styles of this region range from light-bodied to full and rich. Ruby red, with aromas and flavours of licorice, rye bread, berry mix and red fruit. Medium-bodied and fruity with soft tannins, this is perfect for spaghetti and meatballs.

Name: El Abuelo Organic Sauvignon-Verdejo
Description: El Abuelo (meaning grandfather) is organically farmed. Pale straw colour shows fresh and intense citrus fruit with lime and tropical aromas. The palate had good length, with a crisp and refreshing finish. Very food-friendly and ready to be enjoyed with grilled fish and chicken or just sipping on its own.

Name: Fazi Battaglia Verdicchio Dei Castelli Di Jesi DOC
Description: A winery with a long history of making quality wine; now run by the 4th generation. Pale straw yellow colour. Aromas of fresh bread, mineral notes, spice, nuts and mushrooms. The palate is fresh, clean, slightly spritzy, with balanced acidity and flavours of lees, spices, nuts and mineral notes.

Name: Aveleda Vinho Verde
Description: Aveleda has been a family-owned business since the 1870s and vinho verde is their key focus. This one is pale lemon coloured with fresh lifted aromas of fresh bread, citrus, herbs and green plum and apple. Harmonious on the palate with balanced acidity and bright flavours that culminate in a zesty, slightly spritzy finish.

Name: Bodacious Smooth White
Description: Bodacious Smooth White is a bestseller and customer favourite! Medium sweet, with lifted aromas and flavours of herbs, ripe pears and cantaloupe, this blend of aromatic varieties is great for entertaining, and delicious with appetizers, salads and Asian cuisine.

Name: Sprucewood Shores Beach Glass White VQA
Description: A jewel of a wine made at Ontario's only beachfront winery. It exhibits aroma and flavours of grapefruit, pear, melon and creamy lemon curd with notes of smoke and mineral. The palate is dry, light-bodied, clean and fresh with juicy citrus, white fruit and hints of spice on the finish. Enjoy on its own or with appetizers.

Name: D'Ont Poke The Bear White VQA
Description: An exciting blend of chardonnay, sauvignon blanc and riesling. Quite forward and aromatic on the nose, with notes of citrus, nuts, smoke and cantaloupe. The palate is extra dry, medium bodied, well-balanced and rounded with flavours of citrus, nuts, smoke and melon.

Name: Naoussa Xinomavro, PDO Naoussa
Description: Beautifully crafted using the indigenous Xinomavro grape grown in the Naoussa region of northern Greece. The bouquet is aromatic with red fruit, leather, tomato, herbs and spice. The balance of lively acidity with robust tannins creates a perfect match for grilled meats, spaghetti bolognese and aged cheeses.

Name: The Seven Deadly Zins Old Vine Zinfandel
Description: Zinfully delicious Cali Zinfandel that features all you're looking for in the state's classic variety. The lifted aromas suggest blackberry preserve, toast and spice cupboard. A rich, fruity wine perfect for steaks or meat-based pasta dishes.
